website_summaries.verdict: With cute Peppa Pig characters that kids love and an affordable price, you will be impressed with the value of this versatile playset.
pros: You get a lot for your money with this adorable playset, including a house, 15 pieces, and 3 popular character figures – Peppa, Suzy, and George
cons: Small pieces mean it's not recommended for kids 3 and under
Some of the components feel thin and flimsy, but kids don't usually care

website_summaries.verdict: Durability issues aside, it's an affordable playset that comes with numerous accessories young Peppa Pig enthusiasts will appreciate.
pros: Kids will find many creative things for Peppa, George, and Suzy to do in this deluxe house that has 4 brightly colored rooms
In addition to the 3 characters, a variety of accessories are included
cons: Some of the pieces are flimsy
The latch on the house tends to stick or fail to close securely

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it, i glued the parts
customer_reviews.text: Great! my 19 month old baby likes it. I glued most of the parts so i dont look for them everywhere. It makes stowage easier too. Unboxing wasnt that bad, you just need scissors, no screws. When it wasnt glued, all the toys are just shaking inside the house. I suggest to mommies with younger toddlers to glue the toys so when u open it its already set up, easier to stow & toys doesn’t go missing.
customer_reviews.author: Cc bear

customer_reviews.title: Too lightweight , falls over when playing
customer_reviews.text: This house would be perfect if it didn’t tip over every time my daughter would play with it. She get so frustrated when it falls and all of the pieces the flying I have tried it on carpet and on wooden floor and it seems to no matter what you put it on falls over it is very light weight and not sturdy enough to stand up while someone plays with it. Very disappointed for the price and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy from Williamsburg

customer_reviews.title: A big waste of money and plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Very badly designed. The house is too shallow for the furniture pieces to sit in and too small to stand on its own when the kids try to play with it. Basically the manufacturer said " how can we cash in on the Peppa Pig craze with the least amount of effort at the most attractive price possible?" The dolls don't even fit in the chairs or beds. You need an adult to balance it together as pictured and then the kids get frustrated because it doesn't stay. A big waste of money and plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for her age
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as the "big" present for our 2.5 year old Peppa loving daughter with the family figure set. Grandma bought the mini camper van and school bus to go with it. She played quietly and contently all day with this house; she absolutely loves it. They all go up and down the stairs and in the fridge for a snack, have a bath; she is smitten. Perfect gift for her age; she's even sleeping with the figures. Good toy for imaginative play. 4 stars because I'm undecided if the price is a little steep; it does include a fair amount but it is a small house. Regardless, I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: American Princess

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids, they'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was our three year old daughter's absolute favorite toy this Christmas, she absolutely loves it, and even though most of her toys cost more, she plays with this one the most. Thank you Amazon for getting it to us by Christmas Eve, it made our entire Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Loved the house
customer_reviews.text: Loved the house, this is so cute and perfect! It was packed well and arrived in perfect condition. I can't wait for my daughter to open it in her birthday! :)
customer_reviews.author: Marie_23

customer_reviews.title: Great Item, Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Love this house. When the package was delivered, I was surprised by the size. I did not expect the house to be so big and come with so much stuff (everything pictured - the bunk beds, the tub, the couch, etc and the characters too). I'm so used to toys being expensive and with the bare minimum of accessories. If any at all. Usually pictured with a lot of fun stuff and a disclaimer "items sold separately" - not the case with this house!! I've noticed with Peppa Pig, the makers don't skim. If you're wondering if its worth the price, it is! I know my child will go bananas for this on her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Chimney161Top Contributor: Minecraft

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with the little girls.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece. It was a big hit for her and all the other little girls that were there to play with it. It took a long time to take all the pieces out of the box so they could play with it. It seemed every single piece was twist tied to the box. Try getting each piece out with 5 little 4 years old jumping around waiting to play with it and watching you take each piece out one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Lorianza

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for the first situational games.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for the first situational games. I bought it for my 20 month old and he likes to sit piggies at the table on the chairs or put them to bed or walk them to the stairs. His piggies like to look at the window and "open, shut" ( like he says) refrigerator. It is also convenient that you can carry this house anywhere. My son never watched Peppa Pig show but he liked the house, he has his own plot for those pigs :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sweetie and Geek

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it is me growing up or if the toys loose in quality, but I feel like none of those new toys are really great quality anymore... The pieces are flimsy, you loose them easily... I don't know... I am not convinced about this toy... Not even a week into it and a lot of pieces got lost, and or broken... It was a nice concept though... I wish they could build little houses that stay together a little more.
customer_reviews.author: AnaG

customer_reviews.title: Once you finally get it closed it will not stay snapped shut which is a disappointment. My daughter seems to like it for now ...
customer_reviews.text: This was not exactly what I had expected. I was hoping to use this to hold all of my daughter's peppa pig characters since it closes so she could carry it around with her. The house will not close at all unless you snap the stairs off, which doesn't seem very well though out, they seem fragile. The house is hard to get closed with the items and characters inside, which I thought was the point. Once you finally get it closed it will not stay snapped shut which is a disappointment. My daughter seems to like it for now so I am giving it 3 stars. I am disappointed with the poor design.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great toy.
customer_reviews.text: My child LOVES this set. She has never seen a Peppa Pig episode in her life, but she knows the character from books and toys and she spends hours playing with this house. I play with her pretending to do our daily routine (to help her understand transitions and routines better) and she loves it. The pieces are not too tiny, so they are easily manipulated. The fridge door opens. Great for traveling too. In general, I am very satisfied with this purchase. I felt like I did not really needed to spend a little fortune in a house set and this one did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: a BIG HIT with my grand-daughters.
customer_reviews.text: My (now) 3 yo grand-daughter absolutely loves Peppa Pig. I have to say it is a very "civilized" and "polite" animated kids show. She immediately knew where everything should go ... made sure George is sleeping in the bunk-bed as in the show, etc. etc. The bathtub must go in the right room ... Big hit. My other grand-daughter (almost 2) is mesmerized by it and will receive one for Christmas. Note this is a small doll-house (which is not a bad thing since "clean-up" and storage is a breeze).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PRETEND PLAY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT PRETEND PLAY Peppa Pig House!!!! We purchased this for our granddaughter. It has a lot of features that she loves. Easy to pack-up and store away when not in use. We received it in excellent condition and highly recommend it to others!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute house
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute product, my 2 year old loves it. It was however a huge pain to unwrap. The amount of plastic tied and things inside was ridiculous. I’m so happy I unfind it before I wrapped the gift bc otherwise we would have spent 15 minuets undoing it for her Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey B

customer_reviews.title: Super fun little playhouse for Peppa fans
customer_reviews.text: Super fun little playhouse for Peppa fans. My two year old got it for her birthday and it is her favorite toy. The only reason I gave it four stars and not five is because you have to detach the stairs to fold the house closed and it's not easy for kids to do that on their own. I also purchased an additional Peppa friends pack and that way everyone can come over to visit!
customer_reviews.author: KeepOnReading

customer_reviews.title: A Sturdy, Fun, Playset!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool set that seems to appeal to children of different ages. My 7 year old niece, 4 year old and 2 year old sons all love it. They arrange the furniture in different way and pose the figures to do different activities around the house. Construction seems sturdy. It has held up to active play for several months without breaking. Probably the coolest feature is that the house folds up for play on the go (and everything can be finagled to fit inside).
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this item. Peppa Pig products are not easy to come by. This item is a great size and folds up very compact so your little one can carry it around everywhere. All of the pieces fold up nicely into the house. My daughter spends hours playing with it. If you have a Peppa Pig fan in your house this is a must buy!! It's a great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome playhouse for my granddaughter who was turning 4, and obsessed with all things Peppa. The items in the house are sturdy and great quality - there's no stickers to apply - it all comes ready to go. We also got her a playhouse which features a female Disney character, and this house put that one to shame, and this was much better priced! I highly recommend this toy!!
customer_reviews.author: Katniss05Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves Peppa!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Peppa Pig Deluxe House sent to my granddaughter, who is a big Peppa Pig fan. She was delighted to get it, and it has provided hours of fun for this little almost four year old. I had sent her the Talking Peppa for Christmas and she also loved it. Now she is turning four and will be getting the Peppa Pig Red Car for her birthday, along with a few other Peppa Pig items. WoW, she can't get enough of Peppa!!
customer_reviews.author: guardianangel

customer_reviews.title: She's pretty patient and has good fine motor skills
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year old daughter was so excited to get this "toy house" from Santa. It's cute, but the plastic is slippery so it's hard to make the figures actually sit in the chairs a the table, on the couch, or stay put in bed. She's pretty patient and has good fine motor skills, but it could be frustrating for some children and requires help from an adult at times. For example, the bunk bed ladder falls down as soon as you touch it.
customer_reviews.author: AllyG

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old niece LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: She loves playing with peppa and George and Suzy and sits then down to eat at the table and to watch Mr potato on TV, and she sits them on their chairs with her when she sits in front her fireplace. She hasn't figured out how to get the stairs on the house, or how to pack them all in the house, but she does love to walk around worth the house closed. She loves everything peppa! And loves this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves playing with this, but we can't figure ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves playing with this, but we can't figure out how to close the house to carry it places. It has a handle and it closes, but the stairs are in the way and it doesn't latch close. If she picks it up by the handle when it's "closed" it opens and everything falls out.
customer_reviews.author: Araceli

customer_reviews.title: Jessica loved her Peppa Pig House!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter absolutely loved this. She played with it for hours Easter weekend. She will be 3 yrs. old this month and it was a joy to watch her play with it and listen to her talking while playing. She was in her own little happy world!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set for Peppa Pig lovers!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves Peppa Pig and this is his favorite Peppa Pig set! He likes to put the different items in various rooms! He’s aggressive with his toys and these have held up for two months now with nonstop playing!
customer_reviews.author: desertjax

customer_reviews.title: Cute but needed to be better made
customer_reviews.text: My son was do excited to get this house and has played with it often....however the furniture and other little toys included aren't well made. Little pieces continuously fell off and I would have to keep putting them back together which became a nuisance. I believe they have now improved on the houses where the furniture and things are made differently. It's still a cute little playhouse but the could've been better made.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy J

customer_reviews.title: Love the Design and Functionality !!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun and awesome gift idea for the Peppa Pig Lover in your life! The quality of these items is very strong and durable! You can let the kids rough them up a little bit and you won't have to worry about any damage whatsoever. You get everything that is pictured and this is truly a gem to have in the little one's collection =)
customer_reviews.author: Madame

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: my girls (4 and 6) love peppa pig and have so much fun playing with this. My only complaint is that the furniture is pretty dinky and cheap, and they have a hard time flipping the pieces over without them falling out. That's frustrating for them and me. They love it which is all that matters to me, but I think for the price it should either have better pieces or be a little less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks in ads and commercials
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this birthday gift! She's a little obsessed with peppa pig right now, and loves that she can fold up this little dollhouse and take it with her wherever she goes. Only reason I gave it grew stars is because it is way smaller than they make it look in the ads and commercials. Partly my fault for not reading measurements but definitely partly theirs for semi-false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: C. Millin

customer_reviews.title: Surprise of Our Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter loves Peppa, but I thought she would have to "grow into" this toy a little. I didn't know she would play with this as much as she has, 'pretending' with the characters...it is a treat to see each time. The pieces are amazingly like the drawings on the show, and each of the little toys (tables, beds, washing machine, TV) has two sides that flip to different things...NEAT! Only improvement I would recommend is the set needs Mommy and Daddy pig figures too. My daughter uses the cardboard cutouts of mommy and daddy that were part of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D. Steele II

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift !!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my niece for her Birthday and she just LOVES it . She took it in her room with her while she napped they napped also . She woke up and played with it until supper then again lol . She again brought the house and car up to her room and they sleep when she does , so adorable !!! I would not hesitate to purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: The figures are great - they bend so they can sit
customer_reviews.text: The figures are great - they bend so they can sit. The house itself is very cheap plastic. Nothing special - hard to open when shut closed as there is no latch or handle to open it back up. Kids have to ask for adults to help open it each time. Cute and of course the kids love it...not sure it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: apears

customer_reviews.title: Almost Three year old ADORED IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: My great niece LOVED this! It's narrower and good for little hands. She unwrapped it and showed it to everyone around the Christmas tree and said--"I GOT PEPPA PIG...I GOT Peppa..." So cute and she played and played with it. She only wondered why Peppa's dad wasn't included? :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun children's toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a hit with the kids, fun to play in the house. We also bought a couple other friends to play there, Rebecca Rabbit, Suzy Sheep, Pedro Pony, and I think Zoey Zebra? There are several items of furniture, etc, and even a bathtub and fridge, it is a fun little set.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this Peppa Pig house!
customer_reviews.text: A hit for a 2 year old! This is a quality product that folds up nicely. Pigs included and many fun accessories that all fit when folded. A handle for carrying around as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brett G

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toys for 2- year old
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter is 2 and a half.I purchased the Peppa pig playhouse,family car,and the set with all of Peppa Pig's school friends,for her to use when she comes to visit. The toys became her favorites.She arranges them for play and gives them conversations as she plays.I did play a CD of Peppa Pig and her family,beforehand,because I liked the loving interactions between Peppa Pig and her parents.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Gardens

customer_reviews.title: This is so small. Not at all what I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so small. Not at all what I thought it would be. I spent alot on this for no reason. Wish it was bigger or at least had enough room to fit the furniture inside that came with it
customer_reviews.author: Kristan

customer_reviews.title: Peppa Pig Lovers...
customer_reviews.text: You can see on my previous posts for other peppa pig toys that my 3 year old is completely obsessed with Peppa Pig. This is a good toy keeps her busy. 2 comments from my 3 year old. She was sad not all the pieces open. Like I guess the stove. And also the stairs have to come off to close it up. Other than that its a winner.
customer_reviews.author: andiabm

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice house
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift the child was very excited to get. It is nice and actually bigger than what we had anticipated. Young kids can still carry it easily and enjoy it very much.
customer_reviews.author: gen

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute Playset
customer_reviews.text: This arrived very quickly. I haven't given it to my nephew yet (This is one of his Christmas presents) but I'm sure he'll be happy to get this since he's been asking for it for the longest time. He loves Peppa Pig toys and has quite a few of them. This playset is really cute and colorful, and comes with quite a bit of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our 8 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old in the house loves Peppa Pig and think that this is the coolest thing ever in his world of Toys. Mr. Man is autistic that is why he loves the show heck i am 42 and like to sit and watch it with him its cool
customer_reviews.author: Loran G. Glasco

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Yes. Buy it. My daughter (2) has slept with the table and chairs for a couple nights. Then it was the entire family in a cup, And tonight I think it's the bathtub and a stone. It's all quite big and each item is mainly made of 1 piece of plastic. so I'm not worried at all. yes biggest hit so far. She can relate and does roll play. Hours of entertainment. Even I like playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Let the games begin oink oink
customer_reviews.text: Got a kid that like Peppa and don't have this yet? Get it! By far my daughters favorite toy! And it packs up nicely
customer_reviews.author: melania

customer_reviews.title: HUGE HIT IN OUR HOUSE! All the parts/pieces fit and store inside!
customer_reviews.text: My son is STILL smiling after receiving this. He runs downstairs to play with it and put the pieces in different room as he re-creates his favorite scenes from Peppa Pig episodes. Then he "goes off-script" and makes up his won fabulous stories. If your little one likes Peppa Pig, they'll LOVE this playhouse. Plus all the pieces store inside the house!!! Now if I could just get him to let me throw out the box... :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sue D.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fold Up Peppa House
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! A lot of fun and cool accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ladder is an issue
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that you have to detach the ladder to be able to close it. My 3 year old can’t do that on her own so it’s becoming a pain.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Imaginitive and easy to play with.
customer_reviews.text: This play house is colorful and easy for my kid to open. I like how on certain bits of the furniture you can change it so that it looks empty or like it's being used (table, bed, washer). My only complaint is that it can be hard to fit all the furniture and characters in the house to fold it up. I also had to buy a separate set to get Mommy and Daddy Pig. So now we have two Peppa and Georges.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tassin

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves peppa pig. She discovered the series on her own a while back on youtube and I thought she might like the play house set. This is her main stay toy set now, has been for six months or so. The characters are durable, really true crafted to the shape of the cartoon characters. Down side is these cost a fortune, they really need to bring the series here to the USA and make the toys local, as best I can tell you can only get them in the UK.
customer_reviews.author: CRK

customer_reviews.title: Great b day present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 4 year olds birthday. She didn’t have any Peppa Pig stuff even though she watches it so I was pretty excited for her. She loves i
customer_reviews.author: jnj9612

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tou for my toddler who loves peppa the pig. It comes with lots of pieces for play. He loves it and has played for hours and hours with it. The price was amazing compared to store prices. No regrets on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D&N

customer_reviews.title: Unlimited creative opportunities!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with the set of figures for my two year old granddaughter. In combination they allow limitless creative time for her. Love Peppa!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Dahlke

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: I had one very happy peppa pig loving little girl the day this arrived. Smaller pieces so be careful if your toddler likes to put things in their mouth. But overall very similar to her Little People items. Smaller a tiny bit and not as strong of pieces so I don't know if it will hold up as well as those. But worth it to make them smile. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Moses

customer_reviews.title: Great for Peppa fans on the Go!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old granddaugher LOVES Peppa Pig. So I bought her this for Christmas. She loved it. She carried it everywhere. I think it was her favorite gift of all of Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Great toy but they should include mama pig strange they didn't
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute toy. Big house lots of fun accessories for all the rooms . My children and their friends have a ton of fun playing with this . The reason I deducted 1 star is that there is no mama pig which seems to be a disappointment for all the kids playing with this toy at our house .
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are big Peppa Pig fans, and to my surprise, I couldn't find anything in the big name stores. So upon finding this on Amazon, I had to get it for them!! It is so adorable, comes with some furniture. The only reason I left out a star is because the bunk beds are very delicate and broke easily. And it doesnt come with the whole family of characters, those I had to order seperate. But overall, very cute.
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH JULIAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and was securely packed. The toy was exactly as pictured and arrived undamaged. Nice toy for a small child. Our granddaughter is four and loves peppa pig and will love playing with the house and additional friends we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T

customer_reviews.title: Cute Playhouse!
customer_reviews.text: My soon-to-be-five-year-old son loves Peppa Pig and he loves this house...he adds his Star Wars characters in it so Peppa can have more friends over...its is really a cute play house!
customer_reviews.author: C. Green

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for the kiddies
customer_reviews.text: Kids will have tons of fun playing with this as it comes with all the little accessories in the house. The items are sturdy and don't seem likely to break/damage easily.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Great size. My 3 year old received as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size. My 3 year old received as a birthday present and loves it! I did purchase the whole family since it doesn't come with the dad or mom. Character's legs move forward so they can sit flat on furniture. Great price on Amazon compared to in the store. Good quality and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice house with some flaws
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just had to have this house. She loves Peppa pig. My biggest complaint is the stairs and the ladder for the bunk bed. The house cannot close if the stairs are still attached and they are not easy for my daughters to remove. It leads to frustrations. Just a design flaw that should be looked at. The ladder barely rests against the beds and would constantly fall off when they were playing with another part of the house. I ended up throwing it out to prevent stress. The house is sturdy and my girls play with it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Portable Peppa Pig House
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little Peppa Pig house, and my 4 year old daughter loves it! The only thing keeping me from giving it a 5 star rating is the fact that it's pretty small. Otherwise it was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Misty M.

customer_reviews.title: Really worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 2 1/2 yr. old granddaughter. She LOVES this house! It comes with furniture for every room, Peppa, George and the lamb friend (all of which can be packed up as the house closes up as a carry case!) Hours of fun for her, hours is peace for me! A must buy if your lil ones watch Peppa and oink ;)
customer_reviews.author: Christine L Ruffo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little house, perfect size i honestly thought it was going to be small, but i am impressed looks like the one pictured and still in the original package! I highly recommend this product and this seller! I received it a few days earlier which is even better!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Ann

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting it to be bigger. Stickers on items ...
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting it to be bigger . Stickers on items inside house come off faster with just normal play. If your kids loves peppa it's a okay item if you don't mind spending $25 to $30 on a smaller doll house
customer_reviews.author: J Kirsch

customer_reviews.title: Three-year-old granddaughter loved this set
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty expensive, but very nicely made. Perfect for a young child who loves Peppa.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peppa Pig's Deluxe House
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the Peppa Pig's Deluxe House. This set was so adorable and super cute! I got this for my daughters birthday because she is obsessed with pigs, when she opened the gift she squealed with joy and didn't want to open any other gifts! I was very pleased with how well this set holds up, my daughter is hard on toys and she can not break these! The Peppa Pig's Deluxe House colors are true to the Peppa Pig Movies and it comes with one of Peppa Pigs Friends. We are very pleased and excited with the Peppa Pig's Deluxe House!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Kid tested, kid approved
customer_reviews.text: A must have for Peppa Pig kids. After a couple of months being kid tested, it is still intact. Good quality for an inexpensive accessory
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parker

customer_reviews.title: Such a great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Such a great quality product... I would have expected to pay double for what I received.. my grandson loves it. He bathes with Peppa, Georgie & Suzy and their little tub. This is a real winner.
customer_reviews.author: Style Geek

customer_reviews.title: My four year old son loves this playset! We ...
customer_reviews.text: My four year old son loves this playset! We also purchased the Peppa and Family playset, so that we could have Daddy Pig and Mummy Pig to go along with Peppa and George. He takes this playset everywhere he goes. My only complaint is that there is no lock when the playhouse closes, so the set can swing open when it's being carried.
customer_reviews.author: Netanella

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this product
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grand daughter loves Peppa Pig and this little house is adorable. She plays with it for hours at a time. It is very well made and sturdy. She has the camper and trailer also, can't go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Love to buy on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old daughter plays with this daily. ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter plays with this daily. and she's had this now for months. She loves using her imagination to play with her Peppa Pig figures in this playhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t think the quality of the house is all that great but she still loves
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has played with these for hours she’s 2 1/2 and loves peppa pig!! I didn’t think the quality of the house is all that great but she still loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This toy is one of the best purchases we made for my three year old
customer_reviews.text: This toy is one of the best purchases we made for my three year old. She is a big peppa pig fan, and squealed in delight when she saw it. All the pieces are easy to handle, and are well contained in the house it comes it, which can close into itself. No mess! Happy mommy, Happy baby! I wish it also came with a Mommy and Daddy pig, but nevertheless great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jordana F. Puthenparampil

customer_reviews.title: My son loves Peppa and was thrilled to get this ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Peppa and was thrilled to get this house as a gift. There are lots of pieces to keep him entertained. As an added bonus, he was excited to learn that the refrigerator is just big enough to be a secret hiding spot for a matchbox car ;)
customer_reviews.author: 3BoysV816

customer_reviews.title: My son loves Peppa.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, he loves Peppa, who now regularly has dinner with his Minecraft Zombies who fit nicely in the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Pyle

customer_reviews.title: But she has lot of fun with it
customer_reviews.text: My two-year-old granddaughter loves Peppa's house. The only problem she has with it is getting the bunk-bed ladder to stay put. And she insists on "unsnapping" the stairs to the second floor and I'm afraid at some point it will break.But she has lot of fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tea4Me

customer_reviews.title: great toy for peppa pig fans!
customer_reviews.text: almost did not buy this. husband talked me into it. huge hit. 3 year old daughter plays with it tons. there are some pieces on furniture that flip to show different forms of use. very cute, but can see pieces getting lost. even with that, they are loved by daughter and very glad we got it. great size.... can play on small table.
customer_reviews.author: Mag

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute but can be difficult for little ones to put back together and shut it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Cutest toy
customer_reviews.text: We got the bundle with the peppa house and campervan, they are so cute and my 3 year old loves to switch the pieces back and forth. The house is adorable and super easy to put together. Came right on time in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B.

customer_reviews.title: Daylight robbery
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this product. It is very cheaply constructed, for example the bunk bed ladder does not attach properly and almost none of the accessories open, just cheap plastic boxes really. I can't imagine that this dollhouse costs more than a few dollars to manufacture, it is so not worth the $30 I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Backer

customer_reviews.title: The set closes up nice and neat with all the house hold items and ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Peppa and now she can take her Peppa toys everywhere. This set has loads of little things so she can take Peppa & George in to different areas. My daughter likes taking a bath with her set. The set closes up nice and neat with all the house hold items and is very mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Lithiumflower9

customer_reviews.title: adorable, fun, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My niece LOVES this! Too bad the piggy parents are just cardboard. The furniture is exactly like the show (apparently haha). The house securely closes with everything inside which is wonderful. Fisher-price is always a great choice! Arrived in great solid packaging. Definitely recommend for a Peppa fan!
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this
customer_reviews.text: My children love this toy. Only got 4 stars because it us forever to figure out how to move the stairs so the house could close all the way. Instructions would have been a big help!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 6

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them busy playing and they use there imagination
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter just loves the house. Comes with over 15 play pieces too. It’s just awesome. Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Cottom

customer_reviews.title: Really cute play set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grand daughter. She loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jennykc

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect size, since my niece has 2
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this house! It is the perfect size, since my niece has 2, so it is not that small or as big as other ones.
customer_reviews.author: themonkeys

customer_reviews.title: Most toys get discarded after a few months it seems ...
customer_reviews.text: Most toys get discarded after a few months it seems. However, this is still being regularly played with for two years now.
customer_reviews.author: JM VanZuiden

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old adores peppa pig. She watched for the mailman the day it came a couple of weeks ago and hasn't stopped playing with it since. Its really cute and easy to transport since everything folds up right in the case. It seems good quality as no plastic has snapped or stickers peeled and its had many hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: rowen

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Cheaper than same product in the store. Kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey McCreary

customer_reviews.title: Great Peppa House!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! I got this for my daughters 4th birthday and she absolutely loves it. She has been playing with it non stop! I would definitely recommend for any peppa pig lover. Also it arrived super early and the packing was fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Nerdy Glasses Mom

customer_reviews.title: Peppa pig
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is in love with this little house. She enjoys putting it together and all the little characters that came with it are great.
customer_reviews.author: tuptuspl

customer_reviews.title: Best present ever
customer_reviews.text: Best present ever. Especially because you can store everything in the house and take it along wherever you want to go. My 3 year old loves Peppa Pig, loves this house and is just happy all around.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter  love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this though it has a few issues such as the plastic being a bit soft on certain parts which can lead them to be broken easily other then that it's a really nice toy.
customer_reviews.author: SarahTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Bought this on Prime Day - amazing price for this toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Prime Day - amazing price for this toy. My work kids love it (speech therapy). It comes with a lot of furniture pieces that are sturdy for little hands and everything locks up nicely within the house.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old granddaughter loves this. She will sit for hours playing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of piggy play!
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge hit with the kiddos! Everything fits inside and is super easy to play with, not to mention it's very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great, small doll house
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter LOVES Peppa Pig. She was thrilled to receive this for Christmas. Other reviews had indicated the rotating pieces were flimsy but we haven't had any issues and it's been very well used (and tossed around by toddlers and dogs) for several weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: COmommyX2

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped quickly, when it arrived it was completely intact and looks great! The colors are bright and it appears just like the photo. We haven't pulled it out of the box since it is for my daughters birthday, but will leave another review if the quality is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: mahkalie

customer_reviews.title: Any child who loves Peppa Pig will love this little set
customer_reviews.text: Any child who loves Peppa Pig will love this little set!! We pack it up and bring on road trips or going out to lunch! She loves playing with it and it makes for quick and easy clean up!! Would be a great gift too!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Hard to open the house
customer_reviews.text: Cute little house. My 3 year old loves it. I like that it fits all the pieces in it when it's closed but it is extremely hard to open. My daughter can't do it and it is even hard for me to get it open
customer_reviews.author: Cr1979

product_meta.title: Peppa Pig's Deluxe House
feature_bullets: Peppa Pig's House Playset has four rooms to play: bedroom, living room, kitchen, bathroom
Includes three articulated figures: Peppa, Suzy and George
Peppa Pig's Deluxe House folds closed to store all pieces
15 play pieces, including: washing machine, fridge, barbecue, bunk beds, dinner table, bath tub, and more
Peppa Pig's House is for Ages 3+
